snippet: Ashton Kutcher, the sitcom star of "Two and a Half Men," is set to play Steve Jobs in an independent film about that Apple co-founder.
abstract: Ashton Kutcher, the sitcom star of "Two and a Half Men," is set to play Steve Jobs in an independent film about that Apple co-founder.

headline.main: Think Very Different: Ashton Kutcher to Play Steve Jobs
headline.print_headline: Think Very Different: Kutcher to Play Jobs
